comments: Very easy. Take this class!!! She also loves chatting with students about random subjects so its not so boring...very funny and enthusiastic! Learned a lot from this class

This teacher was very fun, and informative. She really cases about what she is teaching, and wants to make sure everyone doesn\'t memorize, but learn for the future. She also was very helpful and approachable. She also would be open to discussions in class, and making sure everyone understands what is going on. I would love to take her class again!!
very easy, but still i recomend that students read assigned reading to get your money\'s worth. she is real cool and loves to talk and loves that students talk back. i recommend this teacher.

Hey. If you want to get an easy A-take her. She is the easiest teacher I have ever had. All you have to do its just 3 test-super easy, she will give you questions and answers, healthstream, powerpoint presentation, interview and fixing health paper. Really easy!!!!!!!Her class is realy interesting and go so fast becuase she is so nice and funny.
the best class i ever took. had alot of fun and learned even more.

cordova is the best. Great teacher had alot of fun in her class. I also learned alot. If you have to take this class take it with her. Better than i expected. Is fair with grading and projects. Health stream is a must to complete the class.

Best teacher by far! She\'s very clear & makes med term far more interesting than I ever imagined it to be. Altough she doesn\'t count attendance, don\'t miss a class bc you\'ll be far behind. As long as you pay attention, follow her lectures, & read what she tells you to, you will pass without even having to study much. I wish she taught more classes!

I took her class for medical term. This is all new to me and she didnt teach anything clearly. You can barely understand her because her english isnt that good. And she didnt even put up powerpoints. She didnt even teach all she would do is make us play games the whole class. DONT TAKE HER, BAD TEACHER

Took her for intro 2 HC, which is suppose to give you a overview and I learned nothing in this class, you present everything u turn in, you watch pointless movies the whole time, DONT BUY THE BOOK! she gives you the ?s and answers for the quizzes. DO HEALTH STREAM and all the assignments, because theres really only a few of them.
This is the worst class I have ever taken. It is an easy class but she doesn\'t give good direction or let you know why you get the grades you have...We watched movies most of the time. Ridiculous!

If you want an easy A, take her. If you want your money well spent, don\'t. I can\'t honestly say I learned anything in her class. She makes you present the same "presentations" all semester long. What a waste of a good class!
